Never thought it was possible that anyone could make a toilet worse than American Standard. But Duravit did it!! The worst toilet in the world. Flushing it clears at least 25% of the contents of the bowl. So you will flush 3-4x every time you use it. And you’ll wait 2 mins or more between flushes.
